item.title: Close please
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

titanpure7:

lol tyler, ur mad cus i didnt pay u to code my shit, fuck off. u and pray_to_hit can smd. mr i wanna be admin i can code then flip n rage when i ask u to help with somethin cuz u dont know how r0fl fucking idiot./

Bro.

I didn’t WANT to be paid to code your shit. I was pissed off because you were paying coders when I offered multiple times to do it for free. Plus, I could’ve easily coded what you asked, but I thought, if you can’t even trust me with the source, and you want me to write the code file then send it to you, why bother? You would’ve used me anyways.

item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

[quote=“titanpure7, post:7, topic:449457”]oh? added auras, custom nomad, patched leaks bro play b4 u talk shit. fixed clanwars, the right way. matrix release was total shit. orig matrix release had over 6000 errors in eclipse. over 6000 failed attempts to code. i fixed all of them, and added much more. i fixed all pets, fixed summoning from the base. i fixed almost everything matrix tried releasing.

also i have made 6 additional skills trainable that matrix had not. almost have all skills ready to b released and fully trainable. including construction, with your own POH and dungeoneering.[/quote]

You don’t know the very basics of java (looking @ the help threads) yet you claim to have coded 6 fully trainable skills including construction & dungeoneering? And fix over 6000 errors? I bet you can’t even fix a missing bracket…

item.title: Close please
item.dc:creator: @TeeBark TeeBark
item.description:
@TeeBark wrote:

Lol, you’re horrible.

  1. You’ve never hosted an RSGP tournament.
  2. You do not have all skills ready for release.
  3. You got your customs from Hemulation, hence why you still have the partyhats Charlie, Imagine, and more.
  4. The client in your pictures still says Disturbed.
  5. Your forums have no download links.
  6. This is RS California.
  7. You have no webclient like the advertisement says you would have had one by July 15.
  8. You say working dungeoneering in the advertisement but then say dungeoneering coming soon.
  9. You have to “pay” aka scam people after they help you, to get your code.
    http://rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/help/425306-paying-up-14-paypal.html
    http://rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/help/423439-paying-10-paypal.html
    http://rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/help/423542-payin-15-paypal.html
    http://rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/help/423007-paying-10-667-help.html
    http://rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/help/417386-paying-15m-rsgp-7-5m-up-front.html

And there’s more links to prove it.
Leach.

Read full topic

item.title: Close please
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:9, topic:449457”][quote author=titanpure7 link=topic=552355.msg4047443#msg4047443 date=1342199159]
oh? added auras, custom nomad, patched leaks bro play b4 u talk shit. fixed clanwars, the right way. matrix release was total shit. orig matrix release had over 6000 errors in eclipse. over 6000 failed attempts to code. i fixed all of them, and added much more. i fixed all pets, fixed summoning from the base. i fixed almost everything matrix tried releasing.

also i have made 6 additional skills trainable that matrix had not. almost have all skills ready to b released and fully trainable. including construction, with your own POH and dungeoneering.
[/quote]

Auras came with it, patched leaks? The fuck are you talking about?.. Matrix didn’t come with 6000 errors. Nick, the compiler only shows a maximum of 100.
Show me the POH + dungeoneering.

Your ‘promo video’ contains curses (was already included with Matrix), Nex (was already included with Matrix), overloads (was already included with Matrix), polypore (I believe it was already included with Matrix), completionist cape (was already included with Matrix), corporeal beast (was already included with Matrix), dragon claws (was already included with Matrix and basically every other server that exists), quick curses (was already included with Matrix), etc etc etc. I like the Nomad.[/quote]

sadly this is just RsCali, i dont know of nearly anything that is changed.

Read full topic
